Package datamodel.classifications

Class ModelClassfication<T>

java.lang.Object
datamodel.classifications.ModelClassfication<T>
Type Parameters:
T - A generic type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Classification<T>, Model<T>
public class ModelClassfication<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Classification<T>
A class that implements the Classification interface. This class can be usefull to store classification data and the number of times it appears in training data.
Since:
2020-05-06
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
Model, Classification, Category, ModelCategory, TreeAugmentedNayveBayes

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.List<T> labels
    The list of labels of each class observed: Example - orange, blue, green, ...
    protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> N_c
    An HashMap with counts for the N_c indexed by the position of a given label in the labels list
    protected int numClasses
    The total number of different classes observed during training
